title: Product Details
description: This mixin is used to capture properties related to product details.

xdm:sku.title: SKU
xdm:sku.description: The unique SKU (stock keeping unit) of the product assigned by the vendor.

xdm:gtin.title: GTIN
xdm:gtin.description: Global Trade Item Number of the product.

xdm:department.title: Department
xdm:department.description: Primary department the product is associated with.

xdm:material.title: Material
xdm:material.description: Primary material of the product construction.

xdm:gender.title: Gender
xdm:gender.description: Gender the product is marketed to.

xdm:size.title: Size
xdm:size.description: Standard product size for the product.

xdm:unitOfMeasure.title: Unit of measure
xdm:unitOfMeasure.description: Standard unit of measure of the product and or variation and relates the units for the size measurement.

xdm:countryOfOrigin.title: Country of origin
xdm:countryOfOrigin.description: The two-character [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://datahub.io/core/country-list) code for the country of origin of the product as defined by customs requirements.

xdm:listPrice.title: List price
xdm:listPrice.description: Default price of the product before sales and discounting, in the `currencyCode` currency.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code used for cost and pricing, including `listPrice` and `COGS`.

xdm:originalSaleDate.title: Original sale date
xdm:originalSaleDate.description: First date the product was made available for sale. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:productURL.title: Product URL
xdm:productURL.description: The URL for the primary product view of the product page.

xdm:productImageURL.title: Product Image URL
xdm:productImageURL.description: The URL for the primary product image of the product.

xdm:productSearchKeywords.title: Product Search Keywords
xdm:productSearchKeywords.description: The search keywords associated with the product.

xdm:productCategoryName.title: Product Category Name
xdm:productCategoryName.description: friendly name of the product category.

xdm:productCatelogName.title: Product Catelog Name
xdm:productCatelogName.description: friendly name of the product catelog.

xdm:productCreateDate.title: Product creation date
xdm:productCreateDate.description: The date when this product was created. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:productLastModified.title: Product last modified
xdm:productLastModified.description: The date when this product was last modified. The time using RFC3339 with a stated time zone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".
